name: St. Patrick's Day 2019 Google Doodle Forever
description: Does what it says on the tin. Replaces the Google logo with the St. Patrick's Day 2019 Doodle.
additional_info: CSS copied from "Doge as Google logo! Wow!" by The PatrollPL (https://userstyles.org/styles/92925/doge-as-google-logo-wow).
